title: List of Galatasaray S.K. managers
text:
<a href="Galatasaray%20S.K.%20%28football%29">Galatasaray Spor Kulübü</a> is a Turkish professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Istanbul">Istanbul</a>, <a href="Turkey">Turkey</a>, who currently play in <a href="S%C3%BCper%20Lig">Süper Lig</a>. This chronological list comprises all those who have held the position of head coach or technical director of the first team of Galatasaray SK since their foundation in 1905. Caretaker managers (interim) are included, as well as those who have been in permanent charge.
The first full-time manager for Galatasaray SK was <a href="Boris%20Nikolof">Boris Nikolof</a>, one of the founders of Galatasaray SK.
The most successful Galatasaray SK manager in terms of trophies won is <a href="Fatih%20Terim">Fatih Terim</a>, who won eight <a href="S%C3%BCper%20Lig">Süper Lig</a> titles, three <a href="T%C3%BCrkiye%20Kupas%C4%B1">Türkiye Kupası</a> trophies, five <a href="S%C3%BCper%20Kupa">Süper Kupa</a>, three <a href="TSYD%20Cup">TSYD Cup</a> and one <a href="UEFA%20Europa%20League">UEFA Europa League</a> Cup (20 trophies in total) in his 10-year reign as manager.
Statistics.
"Information correct as of match played 8 January 2012. Only competitive matches are counted."
By number of games.
"Information correct as of match played 27 July 2020. Only competitive matches are counted."
